snippet: The revised figure reflects growing concerns that the bankruptcy trustee cannot claw back $700 million in customer money trapped at MF Global's British arm.
abstract: The revised figure reflects growing concerns that the bankruptcy trustee cannot claw back $700 million in customer money trapped at MF Global's British arm.

headline.main: MF Global Trustee Sees $1.6 Billion Customer Shortfall
headline.print_headline: Estimate for Missing Cash At MF Global Is Increased
